text: Peter Nigel Terry (15 August 1945 - 30 April 2015) was an English stage and movie actor. He was best known by for his role of King Arthur in John Boorman's Excalibur (1981). He appeared in the movies The Lion in Winter (1968) and Troy (2004). He also appeared in the television series Covington Cross, Casualty, Doctor Who, Highlander: The Series and Waking the Dead. Terry was born in Bristol, Gloucestershire. He died from emphysema on 30 April 2015, aged 69. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Bristol Category:Deaths from emphysema Category:Disease- related deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Nigel Terry
